project_tagline: A simple and stylized way to make custom jokers for Balatro
project_description: This is a simple custom joker maker for [Balatro](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Balatro) written in TypeScript + React. More features are planned!
installation_steps: 1. Clone the repository 2. Run `npm install` 3. Run `npm run dev` 4. Go to `https://localhost:5173` in your browser
license_information: Distributed under the GPL 3.0 License. See LICENSE for more information.
